text: Daudo (race) aur ek dusrey se aage badhne ki koshish karo apne Rubb ki magfirat aur uski jannat ki taraf jiski wussat (width) aasman-o-zameen jaisi hai. Jo muhayya ki gayi hai un logon ke liye jo Allah aur uske Rasoolon par iman laye hon. Yeh Allah ka fazl hai, jisey chahta hai ata farmata hai, aur Allah badey fazl wala hai
